description:
This course is designed to make you a confident manager conversant with many practical tools and techniques.

The certificate from TUV Rheinland will add brownie points to your resume!

Effective communication is an essential skill for everyone, more so for managers in the customer focused industry like banking and finance. Verbal, non-verbal, and written communication play a vital role in every manager's day to day work.

Learn all about the meaning of time management, techniques of time management and the benefits of time management.

Time management is knowing how to use your working day effectively to generate maximum productivity. This course covers the definition of time management plus tips and techniques to manage your time effectively.

This course is designed to help you understand 'Root Cause Analysis' and its importance in solving problems. It will also help you learn about the tools used to conduct root cause analysis. It also aids you in understanding the difference between finding the cause for a problem and finding its root cause.
